review: You deal with the regulated/limited amazon android app store, which I expected. However, I have this connected though the receiver in my entertainment center, and periodically have HDMI disconnect issues during video playback from any app. HDMI connections negotiate a secure digital connection between devices at a hardware level. If the secure connection (and I don't mean physically cable to connector) has trouble staying connected you will see what looks like static as the connection is renegotiated. Once this is re-established it will show the video output again. This happens often in the middle of netflix movies, hulu episodes, or plex movies etc. I called Amazon service and they were no hlep and tried to send me to other Amazon help numbers. Ultimately these issues won't get ironed out except through firmware update which take a long time if they fix it at all. So be aware.I have not had this issue with chromecast, though chromecast is a somewhat different type of device with the same purpose. The issues I have seen with chromecast are with retaining the connection from app to dongle when the device is locked or in sleep mode. It takes a bit of time for it to connect to each other, it's not always instant after waking the device.
